title: Smartphone penetration as share of population in Indonesia 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Share of population with a smartphone
summary: The statistic depicts the smartphone penetration as a Share of the population in Indonesia from 2017 to 2018 , smartphone a forecast up to 2023 .
In 2018 , around 26 % of the population in Indonesia used a smartphone .
gold: The statistic depicts the smartphone penetration in Indonesia as share of the population from 2017 to 2023 . In 2017 , 24 percent of the population in Indonesia used a smartphone .
